**Date Generated:** 2025-12-19

## Day 1: Traditional Tokyo & Modern Vibes
*   **Attractions:** Asakusa (Senso-ji Temple, Asakusa-jinja Shrine), Sumida, Ueno, Akihabara, Harajuku (Meiji-jingu Shrine, Omotesando, Nezu Museum), Shibuya (Shibuya Crossing, department stores), Roppongi (Roppongi Hills, Tokyo City View observation deck).
*   **Focus:** Exploring traditional Tokyo (Asakusa) and modern Tokyo (Harajuku, Shibuya, Roppongi). Consider exploring Japanese history at Meiji Shrine and/or Senso-ji Temple.
*   **Sources:** [tokyocandies.com](https://tokyocandies.com/3-days-in-tokyo-itinerary/), [trulytokyo.com](https://trulytokyo.com/tokyo-3-day-itinerary/), [japanhighlights.com](https://www.japanhighlights.com/japan/tokyo/3-day-itinerary)

## Day 2: History & Shopping
*   **Attractions:** Imperial Palace Area, Ginza, Harajuku, Shibuya.
*   **Focus:** Experiencing both the historical and modern aspects of Tokyo.
*   **Sources:** [tokyocandies.com](https://tokyocandies.com/3-days-in-tokyo-itinerary/), [trulytokyo.com](https://trulytokyo.com/tokyo-3-day-itinerary/), [japanhighlights.com](https://www.japanhighlights.com/japan/tokyo/3-day-itinerary)

## Day 3: Bay Area & Views
*   **Attractions:** Odaiba, Shinbashi, Tsukiji and Hamarikyu Gardens, Zozoji Temple and Tokyo Tower, Shinjuku, Imperial Palace Area.
*   **Focus:** No specific attractions were named in one source, but other sources suggest exploring Odaiba, Tsukiji, and Shinjuku.
*   **Sources:** [tokyocandies.com](https://tokyocandies.com/3-days-in-tokyo-itinerary/), [trulytokyo.com](https://trulytokyo.com/tokyo-3-day-itinerary/), [japanhighlights.com](https://www.japanhighlights.com/japan/tokyo/3-day-itinerary)
